Description: Fantastic 2 bedroom in the Bleachery Area of Waltham, featuring new appliances, recessed lighting, new paint, updated flooring, and 2 car parking in a professionally managed building. You will enjoy all this unit has to offer, generous sized living room and bedrooms with plenty of closet space and hardwood floors. Kitchen is partially open to living room and features granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Very convenient to downtown, shopping, public transportation, RT 20, and Highway access. Heat and hot water included. Make an appointment today!
